    public class UtilPane
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class: UtilPane File: UtilPane.java 
      Description:  This application allows printing of a file or a String to the
               text pane. Most commonly used as about form for GUI based
               applications.
    See Also:
    FileReader, History Log: Created on April 1, 2013, 1:12:19 AM, Serialized Form
